1 <?php

3 namespace Ubiquity\orm;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\Reflexion;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
8 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
9 use Ubiquity\controllers\rest\ResponseFormatter;
10 use Ubiquity\orm\traits\OrmUtilsRelationsTrait;
11 use Ubiquity\orm\traits\OrmUtilsFieldsTrait;
12 
19 class OrmUtils extends OrmUtilsFieldsTrait,OrmUtilsRelationsTrait {
20  private static $modelsMetadatas;
21 
22  public static function getModelMetadata($className) {
23  if (! isset ( self::$modelsMetadatas [$className] )) {
24  self::$modelsMetadatas [$className] = CacheManager::getOrmModelCache ( $className );
25  }
26  return self::$modelsMetadatas [$className];
27  }
28 
29  public static function isSerializable($class, $member) {
30  return ! self::_is ( $class, $member, "#notSerializable" );
31  }
32 
33  public static function isNullable($class, $member) {
34  return self::_is ( $class, $member, "#nullable" );
35  }
36 
37  protected static function _is($class, $member, $like) {
38  $ret = self::getAnnotationInfo ( $class, $like );
39  if ($ret !== false) {
40  return \array_search ( $member, $ret ) !== false;
41  }
42  return false;
43  }
44 
45  public static function getFieldName($class, $member) {
46  $ret = self::getAnnotationInfo ( $class, "#fieldNames" );
47  if ($ret === false || ! isset ( $ret [$member] )) {
48  return $member;
49  }
50  return $ret [$member];
51  }
52 
53  public static function getTableName($class) {
54  if (isset ( self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#tableName"] ))
55  return self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#tableName"];
56  }
57 
58  public static function getKeyFieldsAndValues($instance) {
59  $class = get_class ( $instance );
60  $kf = self::getAnnotationInfo ( $class, "#primaryKeys" );
61  return self::getFieldsAndValues_ ( $instance, $kf );
62  }
63 
64  public static function getFieldsAndValues_($instance, $members) {
65  $ret = [ ];
66  foreach ( $members as $member ) {
67  $v = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
68  $ret [$member] = $v;
69  }
70  return $ret;
71  }
72 
73  public static function getKeyPropsAndValues_($instance, $props) {
74  $ret = [ ];
75  foreach ( $props as $prop ) {
76  $v = Reflexion::getPropValue ( $instance, $prop );
77  $ret [$prop->getName ()] = $v;
78  }
79  return $ret;
80  }
81 
82  public static function getMembers($className) {
83  $fieldNames = self::getAnnotationInfo ( $className, "#fieldNames" );
84  if ($fieldNames !== false)
85  return \array_keys ( $fieldNames );
86  return [ ];
87  }
88 
89  public static function getMembersAndValues($instance, $members = NULL) {
90  $ret = array ();
91  $className = get_class ( $instance );
92  if (is_null ( $members ))
93  $members = self::getMembers ( $className );
94  foreach ( $members as $member ) {
95  if (self::isSerializable ( $className, $member )) {
96  $v = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
97  if (self::isNotNullOrNullAccepted ( $v, $className, $member )) {
98  $name = self::getFieldName ( $className, $member );
99  $ret [$name] = $v;
100  }
101  }
102  }
103  return $ret;
104  }
105 
106  public static function isNotNullOrNullAccepted($v, $className, $member) {
107  $notNull = UString::isNotNull ( $v );
108  return ($notNull) || (! $notNull && self::isNullable ( $className, $member ));
109  }
110 
111  public static function getFirstKeyValue($instance) {
112  $prop = OrmUtils::getFirstPropKey ( get_class ( $instance ) );
113  return Reflexion::getPropValue ( $instance, $prop );
114  }
115 
116  public static function getFirstKeyValue_($instance, $members) {
117  $fkv = self::getFieldsAndValues_ ( $instance, $members );
118  return \current ( $fkv );
119  }
120 
121  public static function getKeyValues($instance) {
122  $fkv = self::getKeyFieldsAndValues ( $instance );
123  return implode ( "_", $fkv );
124  }
125 
126  public static function getPropKeyValues($instance, $props) {
127  $values = [ ];
128  foreach ( $props as $prop ) {
129  $values [] = Reflexion::getPropValue ( $instance, $prop );
130  }
131  return implode ( "_", $values );
132  }
133 
134  public static function getMembersWithAnnotation($class, $annotation) {
135  if (isset ( self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) [$annotation] ))
136  return self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) [$annotation];
137  return [ ];
138  }
139 
147  public static function exists($instance, $memberKey, $array) {
148  $accessor = "get" . ucfirst ( $memberKey );
149  if (method_exists ( $instance, $accessor )) {
150  foreach ( $array as $value ) {
151  if ($value->$accessor () == $instance->$accessor ())
152  return true;
153  }
154  }
155  return false;
156  }
157 
158  public static function getAnnotationInfo($class, $keyAnnotation) {
159  $metas = self::getModelMetadata ( $class );
160  if (isset ( $metas [$keyAnnotation] ))
161  return $metas [$keyAnnotation];
162  return false;
163  }
164 
165  public static function getAnnotationInfoMember($class, $keyAnnotation, $member) {
166  $info = self::getAnnotationInfo ( $class, $keyAnnotation );
167  if ($info !== false) {
168  if (UArray::isAssociative ( $info )) {
169  if (isset ( $info [$member] )) {
170  return $info [$member];
171  }
172  } else {
173  if (\array_search ( $member, $info ) !== false) {
174  return $member;
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  return false;
179  }
180 
181  public static function setFieldToMemberNames(&$fields, $relFields) {
182  foreach ( $fields as $index => $field ) {
183  if (isset ( $relFields [$field] )) {
184  $fields [$index] = $relFields [$field];
185  }
186  }
187  }
188 
189  public static function objectAsJSON($instance) {
190  $formatter = new ResponseFormatter ();
191  $datas = $formatter->cleanRestObject ( $instance );
192  return $formatter->format ( [ "pk" => self::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance ),"object" => $datas ] );
193  }
194 
195  public static function getTransformers($class) {
196  if (isset ( self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#transformers"] ))
197  return self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#transformers"];
198  }
199 
200  public static function getAccessors($class) {
201  if (isset ( self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#accessors"] ))
202  return self::getModelMetadata ( $class ) ["#accessors"];
203  }
204 
205  public static function clearMetaDatas() {
206  self::$modelsMetadatas = [ ];
207  }
208 }
